name: タップ De ぷる萌え！ 錦織ゆう
summary:
ちょっと天然で、料理がとっても下手な女の子。
彼氏にせがまれ、水着にエプロンという
マニアックな姿を披露することに・・・。
--
She is not good cook at all by nature. With APRON on her swim suit,she is about to cook with enthusiasm.Please try to stop YU for a disaster to happen...

When you tap her, she swings and you will
hear sweet and sarrow chirping.
Whatever you would like to do by using Hand!
info:
• 开发: FUTURE CREATE
